text: inanite yamenachihu hoyi! nits’uhi yehonechini ts’ets’eti bemets’ets’eti wede alahi temelesu፡፡ getachihu ke’inanite hat’i’atochachihuni liseriyilachihu kesirochachewi wenizochi yemifesubachewinimi genetochi liyasigebachihu yikejelalina፡፡ alahi nebiyuni፣ ineziyanimi ke’irisu gari yamenutini bemayasafiribeti k’eni birihanachewi befitochachewina bek’enyochachewi yemirot’i sihoni «getachini hoyi! birihanachinini mulalini፣ le’inya mihiretimi adirigilini፣ anite benegeru hulu layi chayi nehina» yilalu፡፡
